snippet.title: CyberWhiskey: Guy's Room (Trailer) - CYBERPUNK DYSTOPIAN INDIE ADVENTURE GAME
snippet.description:
CyberWhiskey: Guy's Room will be available to download on Steam in October 2021. Guy's Room is the free dose of a grand CyberPunk opera. The first step in your adventure of transhumanistic enlightenment is to get to work on time.

I'm an indie dev and this is my first real game. It's a free game to get you pumped about my next game CyberWhiskey:2054. If you watched, liked or commented on this video, I love you!

Trailer Song - "Slave Racer" by Savvier
(licensed from icons8.com)
